description:
I have a couple of girl friends who love sex. I mean they really, really love sex. And a great fringe benefit for me is that they are always meeting hot guys.
That's how I met Hunter. He met my friend in a bar and they ended up fucking.
"I have this really hot guy for you," my friend told me the next day. "But he's kind of quiet."
"That's OK," I said.
"You're really going to like him though," she said.
"Oh, why is that?" I asked.
"He's a shooter!" she said.
OK, so all of my friends know that I like guys who can blow a nice, big load. That's no secret...
Now, I don't know how she convinced him to meet with me, but she did. And she was right. He's really quiet. But damn fucking cute.
"It takes a lot for me to talk and get to know you," he told me.
He did open up a little bit, though, and I began to see why he is popular with the girls. Puppy dog eyes, lean muscular build, and a big dick...
title: Hunter
